Posts.Content: Mommakat23 wrote: Hi ladies. I'm new here. My mom has a 2nd bout of breast cancer right now. I'm 49. I had 3D mammogram, got called back for ultrasound. Lady giving ultrasound said it was just routine, nothing to worry about. Then got called back for biopsy. Doctor doing biopsy stated that the reason I was there is because while gray and white show cyst, this was black and showed mass ( my colors could be wrong lol). She said good thing is the borders look smooth. And it's small. 2 mm I think. She gave me the 80 percent talk, but still it's hard to not let your brain go to the dark side. Now 3 to 5 days is going to go by really slow! I can use any prayers and good thoughts. By the way. The biopsy was not bad at all! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Got my biopsy today....now more waiting. I'm going nuts! Mommakat23 Egads007
